SA15bsa075_u:626: tadavasthāyāṃ tu śrutinayanayoriva manaso 'pi kiyaddūreṇa viṣayasannidhivyavasthitika eva pramātuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:628: yāvattena śakyamadhigantuṃ svākārārpaṇasamartha sahakāri vastu tāvaditarajanāsādhāraṇaṃ truṭyadrūpatayā tasya gocarībhavatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:629: ata evārthākāro vastuto na bhāvanāmātrajanita iti na visaṃvādaśaṅkāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:630: bhāvanayā punastadīyasantāne netra ivāñjanaviśeṣeṇa śaktiratiśayavatī kācidarpitā yatparajanāsādhāraṇadarśanamasya /
SA15bsa075_u:636: api ca, arthasya hi ālambanapratyayatvamindriyāpekṣatvena vyāptam /
SA15bsa075_u:638: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūmamādhatte /
SA15bsa075_u:640: na ca bhāvanābalena kasyacidatīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭamiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:657: sati ca vyāptiśaithilye śaṅkāpi nyāyādāpatantī kena pratihanyate /
SA15bsa075_u:660: ataḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāśikākārasya vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiśca vācaspateḥ sandigdhavyatirekitvādanaikāntikī /
SA15bsa075_u:663: prasiddhānumānasya ca na kṣatirdṛśyatvopādherdhūmādeḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptigrahaṇāvirodhāt /
SA15bsa075_u:667: na catīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vādarśane 'pi niṣeddhuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:670: kāraṇābhāvo 'pi adarśanamātrato na sidhyatīti tadavasthaḥ paribhavaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:677: na ca caturāryasatyasvarūpe vastutattve niścite sākṣātkāramantareṇa kleśajñeyāvaraṇakṣatiriti svārthamapi tāvad bhāvanā yuktimatī /
SA15bsa075_u:678: tattvasākṣātkāriṇi ca cittasantāne sati śakyasākṣātkriyamidamityanye 'pi niścayānantaraṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pravartyante,
SA15bsa075_u:679: tadupadiṣṭa svargasādhanaṃ cārthabhāvanayānusarantīti svargāpavargalakṣaṇaparārthasiddhaye ca bhāvanā saphaleti /
SA15bsa075_u:680: anyathā tattvāsākṣātkāriṇo lokānatikrāntasya vacanamanādeyameva syāditi kva parārthavārtāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:681: yacca kiṃ ca tatpramāṇamityādyārabhya tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti etatparyantena dharmādharmayoranumānāpravartanamuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:684: tadā tasya pratyakṣeṇāniścaye 'pi yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalena vyāptisaṃvedanaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanāvasare vyavasthāpitam /
SA15bsa075_u:694: anumānena caikavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭe vastutattve 'vasite 'pi sarvātmanā spaṣṭavastutattvasākṣātkāri pratyakṣaṃ na gṛhītagrāhi,
SA15bsa075_u:696: na ca taduttarakālamityādi tu kāraṇānupalabdhidūṣaṇaprastāve prativyūḍhamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:697: yadapi vācaspatinā satyamityādinā punaḥ punaruttarottaramāśaṅkaya tat kimanumānena vahni vyavasthāpyetyādinā bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve visaṃvādamupadarśyopasaṃhṛtam,
SA15bsa075_u:701: tathā hyayaṃ vahniviṣayenumānapūrvakabhāvanābalataḥ spaṣṭavahnipratyayaḥ kiṃ vahnerapyutpannaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:703: prathamapakṣe visaṃvādaśca bahulamupalabhyate iti yaduktaṃ taddurbhāṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:705_1: 'pi bhāvanārthābhyāṃ sākṣādutpannasya yogipratyakṣasyāpi visaṃvādasaṃbhava iti sthavīyasī bhrāntiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:712: na hi vayaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭavastubhāvanāsahitaṃ manaindriyamarthasvarūpagrāhijñānaṃ janayatīti brūmaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:722: purastāttu bhāvite parisphurati tadarthāpekṣayā bhrāntiḥ prāsarpakasyevetyādyupahāsyamapyasya kṣatātmano durnītipūtigavībhakṣaṇādhmātajaradgomāyorudgāra iva satāmasahyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:727: ato ghaṭāderapyālambanapratyayatvamaśakyāvagamamiti indriyapratyakṣamapi pratihataṃ syāditi / tathā, api (#
SA15bsa075_u:728: Nibandh 20#) cālambanapratyayā api ta eva yujyanta ityādirna punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhateti paryanto vyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:739: ata eva kāminīpratibhāsasyāpramāṇatve 'pyapratyakṣatve 'pi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyadharmasāmānyasya saṃbhavāt na viruddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:756: bhavatu vā, tathāpi yogijñānasya tena saha tulyahetutvamasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:758: yogijñānaṃ tu avidyāpratipakṣasarvavastutattvabhāvanāviṣayābhyāmutpannamiti mahāntamapi viśeṣamasau durmatiprapātapatito nāvagāhata ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:759: nyāyaprakīrṇe tu mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ yat,
SA15bsa075_u:761: yaccāpi cetyādyārabhya yogijñānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ prasaktamityuktam tatra keyaṃ nirviṣayatā nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:774: vyāvahārikasya sphuṭībhāvo 'pi bahirabhimatasya paryante vikalpopādeyakṣaṇasyaiva sphuṭasyodayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:776: Nibandh 21#) viṣayastena sākṣātkṛta iti vyavahāraḥ kevalamarthādapyutpattau /
SA15bsa075_u:783: etena yat pāramārthikamityādi na sarvajñasiddhiritiparyantaṃ pratyuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:784: yaccāpi cetyādi na yuktaṃ paśyāma itiparyantena dūṣaṇamuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:786: tathā hi yādṛśa eva bhāvyagrāhī pratyayaḥ prathamo niranvayo niruddhastādṛśa evāpara utpadyata iti niyamaniścayakāraṇaṃ na kiñcidasti caṇḍadevatāsparśādanyat,
SA15bsa075_u:788: nanu kṣaṇikatvaṃ sthāyitayā virudhyate na visadṛśotpādena,
SA15bsa075_u:789: taddhi prācīnaṃ niranvayanirodhe yathā sadṛśakṣaṇāntaramārabhate tathā svahetugatasāmarthyayogāt kāryotpādānumeyād yadi viśeṣaleśaviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇāntaramutpādayati,
SA15bsa075_u:791: na hi bhavata iva bhāvasyāpi kṣaṇikatāyāṃ pradveṣo nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:815_0: tathā hi caturāryasatyasākṣātkāraprāptau nirāvaraṇāntaḥ karaṇasya kāruṇyātiśayāt
SA15bsa075_u:815_1: sarvākāraparārthaparatayā sakalagocaracāriṇi cetasi ciravirūḍhotsāhasya tādṛgupāyaviśeṣādhigamo bhaviṣyati,
SA15bsa075_u:830: atha svarūpasannihitaṃ jñānameva tadākāramiti nirālambanaṃ niyamena /
SA15bsa075_u:836: yathā sa dṛṣṭaḥ śaradādikālayukta stathā tasya na bādhitatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:837: tatkālayuktastu na tena dṛṣṭa stathāpratītāvapi nāsti doṣaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:838: jñānamātrasya tu tattvataḥ sphuraṇācca na vartamānatāprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:839: tathā kṣaṇikatvapakṣe 'pi ekatvādhyāropasāmarthyānna vyavahārikaṃ prati pramāṇasya kācit kṣatiriti śāstre prapañcitam /
SA15bsa075_u:840: yadapi kiñcedamapi vaktumucitamityādyārabhya bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve 'pi pratyakṣapūrvakatve 'pi vyabhicārābhidhānam,
SA15bsa075_u:847: na deśakālavastuviśeṣamapāsya sāmānyena sarvadikkālavartivastumātraṃ kṣaṇikanirātmakamityaniścaye mahāprayāsasādhyapuruṣāyuṣavyāpinyāṃ bhāvanāyāmeva pravṛtterabhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:848: na ca hāliko havyāśanamanumāya sphuṭīkarotiyena pratyakṣāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:854: sādhyatayaiva tādṝgdaśāviśeṣasya lokātikrāntātiśayasya paramapuruṣārtharūpasya sādhanaviśeṣapratipādanāya pṛthagjanasādhāraṇendriyajñānād bhedena nirdeśāt /
SA15bsa075_u:855: paramapuruṣārthaviṣayatvābhāvādeva ca rasāyanādisaṃskārajasyāpi jñānasya na pratyakṣāntaratā /
SA15bsa075_u:859: adhyavasāyo hi pūrvaṃ durllabhaḥ idānīṃ tu bhāvanābalanirdalitāvidye cittasantāne so 'pīndriyajñānena janyata iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:860: nanu yogino manovijñānendriyajñānābhyāṃ paśyata ākāradvayasphuraṇaprasaṅga iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:863: atastāvākārāvapratimau kayā gatyā spharata iti ko nirṇetuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:866: sarvathā tu na yogijñānasya kṣatiriti siddham /
SA15bsa075_u:868: nanu yadi nāma yuṣmadabhimatasyānumānasya na bādhakam,
SA15bsa075_u:880: nihantuṃ hetavaḥ śaktāḥ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:883: sadbhāvavāraṇe śaktaṃ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:884: atrocyate / kimete jñeyatvādayaḥ sarvajñatvena sākṣādviruddhāḥ paramparayā vā /
SA15bsa075_u:886: sa ca sākṣād virodha parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo vā,
SA15bsa075_u:898: yasya hyavikalakāraṇasya bhavato yatsannidhānādabhāvastayoreva sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:899: na ca sarvajñatvaṃ prāk pravṛttamavikalakāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena paścājjñeyatvādisadbhāve nivartata iti syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:900: tathātve sati deśādiniṣedya eva bhavenna tu sarvathoccheda iti /
SA15bsa075_u:902: sa hi bhavan niṣedhyasya sarvajñatvasya vyāpakaviruddhatvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:920: yathā māyākāro nirmitāśvādiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ nirviṣayatvena niścinvannabhrāntaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:922: tathā bhagavānapi śuddhalaukikavikalpasammukhībhāve 'pi na bhrānto nāpi pṛthagjanasamāna iti /
SA15bsa075_u:932: vikalpenaikasya kasyacidāmukhīkṛtvopadeśe 'pi nirvikalpena sarvamavabudhyamānasya vacanānāṃ sarvajñabhāṣitatvādeva //
SA15bsa075_u:950: viśvāsaśca na tāsu syātkenaitāḥ kīrtitā iti //
SA15bsa075_u:951: kinnu buddhapraṇītāḥ syuḥ kiṃ vā brāhyaṇavañcakaiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:957: atha vā yathā cakrasyoparate 'pi daṇḍapreraṇāvyāpāre pūrvāvegavaśād bhramaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:958: evaṃ bhagavati pratyastamitasamastavikalpajāle 'pi sthite yadi pūrvapraṇidhānāhitasatatānābhogavāhinī deśanā syāttadā ko virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:962: tasmād yathā pūrvābhyāsato jhaṭiti prabodhitasyāriṇā prahārādidānenānurūpa eva prakramaḥ śastroddharaṇādikaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:967: yatpunaruktam piśācādikṛtaśaṅkayā nātrāśvāsaḥ satāṃ yukta iti /
SA15bsa075_u:979: taccet krīḍanaśīlānāṃ rakṣasāṃ vā vaco bhavet /
SA15bsa075_u:991: tadetad vyāpakaviruddhakāryabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñābhāvaṃ sādhayati paramparayā viruddhatvāditi cet / na /
SA15bsa075_u:1004: tataśca viśiṣṭavyavahārasya sāṃkaryeṇa na tatraikāntena rāgānumānaṃ yujyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1006: asaṃmukhībhūtarāgādayo 'pi hi svābhimatadevatāstutividhāne mātrādigurujanasaṃbhāṣaṇādau ca vacanamātramuccārayantaḥ samupalabhyante /
SA15bsa075_u:1007: na ca yadyadabhāve bhavati tasya tatkāryatocyate,
SA15bsa075_u:1014: yadi kāraṇaguṇādisakalatadanyakāraṇabhāve 'pi rāgādi yogyatābhāvānnotpadyate vacanamiti sidhyettasyāḥ kāraṇatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:1023: vītarāge 'rthāsaṅgābhāvāt kathaṃ parārthāpi pravṛttiriti cet / na /
SA15bsa075_u:1029: kāruṇikasyāpi niṣphalārambho na yukta iti cet / na /
SA15bsa075_u:1035: nanu nirvikalpasya bhagavataḥ kathaṃ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ karuṇāsaṃbhavaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1037: tataśca kāraṇābhāvāt kathaṃ kāryasaṃbhava iti cet / na /
SA15bsa075_u:1044: utpāde tu phalasya hetuniyamo no tu prabandhasthitau
SA15bsa075_u:1049: nanu yadi nāmaivaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvena sahāviruddhaṃ dehendriyabuddhyādiyogitvaṃ tu viruddhameva /
SA15bsa075_u:1053: dehādīnāṃ hetutve 'pi naiṣāṃ kevalānāṃ sahakārimātrāṇāmātmābhiniveśalakṣaṇopādānakāraṇavikalānāṃ rāgādijanakatvamityagamakā eva dehādayaḥ sarvajñābhāvasya /
SA15bsa075_u:1056: tathā hi yadyapi teṣāṃ sati prāmāṇye 'numāna evāntarbhāvaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:1060: na ca vaidikaṃ kiñcidvacanaṃ sarvanarāsarvajñatvapratipādaka mupalabhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1061: pratyuta nimittanāmni śākhāntare sphuṭatarameva sarvajñaḥ pratipāditaḥ / tathā hi
SA15bsa075_u:1062: sa vetti viśvaṃ na ca tasya vettā
SA15bsa075_u:1065: tathā hi smaryamāṇameva gavādivastu purovartigavayādisādṛśyopādhi gavādyupādhi vā sādṛśyamupamānena pratīyata iti sthitiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1066: na ca sarvajñasantānavartīni cetāṃsi kenacit sarvajñenānubhūtāni yataḥ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyeran,
SA15bsa075_u:1077: yato dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyata iti adṛṣṭārthaṃparikalpanamarthāpattirucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1078: na cāsarvajñatvamantareṇa sarvanareṣu kaścidartho dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā nopapadyate yatastadarthāpattyā parikalpyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:1086: tathā hi yathā saṃsārasyānāditve pūrvapūrvavastusattāyā anavadhitvaṃ tathā sarvajñajñānasyāpi pūrvapūrvavastusattāvyāpakatvenānavadhiprasaratā iti /
SA15bsa075_u:1099: yacca na kiñcit tatkathaṃ prameyaṃ paricchindyāt,
SA15bsa075_u:1117: kiṃ ca, kaḥ punarayaṃ pramāṇābhāvo 'bhimato bhavatām /
SA15bsa075_u:1126: nanu tathāpi sadvyavahārārthaṃ sādhakamapyasya na vidyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1127: tathā hi sarvavido 'tīndriyatvāt na tāvadasmadādipratyakṣamasya sādhakam /
SA15bsa075_u:1129: na cāyaṃ kālāntare 'bhūditi ca kalpanā yujyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1130: yathā hi kālatvādidānīntanakālavaditi anenānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:1139: kiṃ ca sarvajñasattāsādhane sarvo hetuḥ trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātivartate asiddhatvaṃ viruddhatvamanaikāntikatvaṃ ceti /
SA15bsa075_u:1140: tathā hi sarvajñe dharmiṇi kriyamāṇe na taddharmo hetuḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1149: dṛṣṭo na caikadeśo 'sti liṅgaṃ yo vānumāpayet / iti //
SA15bsa075_u:1152: tatra pauruṣeyopyāgamaḥ tadīyo vā tatra pramāṇam,
SA15bsa075_u:1161: kiṃ ca sarvajñapraṇītādvacanāt sarvajñasiddhau kimaparāddhaṃ svavacanena yenāto 'pyasau na gamyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:1173: na cāpyevaṃ paro nityaḥ śakyo labdhumihāgamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1175: āgamasya ca nityatve siddhe tatkalpanā vṛthā /
SA15bsa075_u:1189: dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyate iti adṝṣṭārthaparikalpanamarthāpattilakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:1190: na cātra pramāṇapratītaṃ kiñcid vastvasti yatsarvajñamantareṇānupapadyamānaṃ tatsattāmupanayet /
SA15bsa075_u:1195: yadapīdaṃ kārikābṛhaṭṭīkayorekaṣaṣṭyā ślokaiḥ sarvajñasiddhaye bauddhasya sādhanamāśaṅkaya dūṣitaṃ tadapi ghṛṇākaramiti granthavistarabhayānna likhitam / (#
SA15bsa075_u:1198: tathā hyetāni kila saugataiḥ sarvajñasādhanāya sādhanānyabhidhīyante
SA15bsa075_u:1207: tadevaṃ sarvathā sarvajñasādhakapramāṇāsabhavādayukto bauddhānāṃ sarvajñe sadvyavahāra iti //
SA15bsa075_u:1225: ayaṃ ca bhāṣyakārīyaḥ sarvasarvajñaprasādhakaprayogaḥ paṇḍitajitāribhiḥ prapañcita iti tata eva pracayato 'badhārya iti /
SA15bsa075_u:1244: vidveṣiṇi viṣajvālā kiñcijjñe tu na kiñcana //
SA15bsa075_u:1245: ihaite naiyāyikādayo vivādapadasya kṣitidharādeḥ svarūpopādānopakaraṇasaṃpradānaprayojanavibhāgapravīṇaṃ sarvajñatādiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣaviśeṣamicchanti / yadāhuḥ
SA15bsa075_u:1248: sa ca kathaṃ sidhyatīti paryanuyuktāḥ sādhanamidamācakṣate /
SA15bsa075_u:1260: sa ca saṃkṣepato vibhajyamāno dvidhā vyavatiṣṭhate /
SA15bsa075_u:1265: kṣmāruhādau dharmiṇi pramāṇasamadhigate kāryatvasya sādhanasya pramāṇapratītatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:1266: cirotpannaparvatādau ca dharmiṇi kāryatvaṃ sāvayavatvena hetunā boddhavyam / tad yathā
SA15bsa075_u:1273: nanu sāvayavatvena hetunā dravyāṇāmeva kāryatvaṃ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:1277: teṣāṃ kāryaguṇāditvena hetvantareṇa kāryatvamadhigantavyam / tathā hi
SA15bsa075_u:1288: tacca śabdādiṣviva pradhvaṃsādāvapi pratyakṣeṇādhigatamiti na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1290: tathā hi yo vipakṣa eva vartate sa khalu sādhyaviparyayavyāpteḥ sādhyaviruddhaṃ sādhayan viruddho 'bhidhīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1299: sarvajñapūrvakatve tu sādhye vyāptiḥ svapne 'pi nopalabddhā /
